name: MORES
description:
This is a "brick breaker" for TDEMO. The project overview is available on request.

We used GamemakerStudio2 and 2D art - pixel inspired created in Photoshop.
Sounds sourced from free license websites.

______________________________________________________________________________________

Version Logs
0.1 Initial set up of the first level with pickaxe and placeholders by Thomas
0.2 Sound effects sources and available to group by Alex
0.5 Various interations; adding start scenes and replacing placeholder art with alpha by Samuel1.0 Helping with replacing placeholder art and making more art to populate the scenes by Elaine

1.3 Added level 2, art and scene, after feedback from playtesting by Elaine

______________________________________________________________________________________

Known Bugs
 - Pickaxe "stuck" in wall.
- Level 2 loading to credit/end scene. (Global Score)

______________________________ Thank you for reading and playing our game! ______________________________
